title: Estate of change
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Housing - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Housing development - Australia

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Housing development - Australia
description: Ascot Vale housing estate was in a state of decay with poorly maintained buildings, not support services and poor and dangerous living conditions. The tenants formed a tenants group which initiated change, maintenance, improvements in living conditions, provided services such as legal aid, migrant classes, a theatre group, milkbar and a community centre. This video shows the change process through interviews with tenants. The second half of the video is the theatre piece performed by the community theatre group.
